ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup PHILADELPHIA Light Cream Cheese Product
2 tablespoons KRAFT Calorie-Wise Rancher's Choice Dressing
⅓ cup broccoli florets, finely chopped

cookingTips: Chop vegetables very finely so they distribute evenly in the filling
Spread filling evenly on tortillas before rolling to prevent leaking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook prepare a quick, healthy appetizer by properly mixing the filling and rolling the tortillas for presentation.
